Entries.GiftReaction_Bouquet: Are you asking me out again!? What, did you forget we're dating? Ha! Aunty will want to hear about this one!
Wow! You went through all the trouble of getting me a new one!? It did get kind of ruffled up in the excitement, didn't it? Sorry about that, but you were so sweet... I had to go in for the hug!

Ah, that's a beautiful arrangement of flowers.$h#$b#Wait, uhm... Isn't this?$u#$b#Of course! I'd love to be your girlfr- Wait... didn't we do this already? Are you intentionally breaking with standard dating conventions as some form of social experiment?
Uhh... thanks, but we don't need anymore of those...$l#$b#Our love is enough to keep this relationship alive!

Look at these! What a handsome arrangement!$h^Look at these! Absolutely gorgeous!$h#$b#Although not as handsome as you of course!$7^Although not as gorgeous as you of course!$7#$b#What's the occasion, just reminding me of how striking you were on the day you first asked me out?$l^What's the occasion, just reminding me of how beautiful you were on the day you first asked me out?$l#$b#I'm reminded of it every day!$h
Oho, what is this? Trying to spark something in my memory and jump-start some romance? Well it's definitely working! I love you @!

Oh!? Another bouquet? I never really understood the point behind these things in the first place. Strikes me as wasteful, you know? We could have simply announced our romantic intentions to the village...$e#But I suppose you're right... they sure are pretty!
Oh, wow! That's really thoughtful of you, @! Now I can have a reminder of you when I'm alone in my room, and in the gym for when I'm working with my clients!
Look at these! Is this kind of like 'renewing your vows'? Well the answer is yes! Always and forever.
Hmm... yes, what is it darling?$7#$b#W-wait... isn't that!?$l#$b#What are you giving me another bouquet for, silly?$b#%*Kisses your cheek*#$b#You know I'm already yours!$h
